name: RPG Maker MV - Darkness Kingdom
detailed_description:
注意事項

  • ツクール以外での使用可能
  • ツクール以外での商用可能
  • 利用時には権利表記必須
  • ユーザーゲーム使用目的に限り、一部素材改変可能（再配布不可）
  • 本素材の著作権、著作隣接権その他一切の権利は、制作元又は制作元が認める第三者に帰属します。


About the Game

New from Ayato Sound Create, Darkness Kingdom is a fantastic well rounded pack for covering any dark, ominous scene your game might need.

Blending retro percussion, choirs and orchestral instruments, reminiscent of 90s game music soundtracks, with music for many different scenarios including battles, boss battles, field jungles, field dungeons, event themes and more, this pack is a great addition to your RPG-themed games and beyond!

Music with orchestration for fantasy, dark themes, danger, horror and more!
30 BGM in .ogg, ogg with loop tag, .mp3, .m4a and .wav formats.

Tracklist:

1. field_nomal_unity
2. field_nomal_enemy
3. field_dungeon_unity
4. field_dungeon_enemy
5. field_jungle_unity
6. field_jungle_enemy
7. field _sky_unity
8. field_sky_enemy
9. field_mental_unity
10. field_mental_enemy
11. field_lastl dungeon_unity
12. field_last dungeon_enemy
13. battle_invasion
14. battle_defense
15. battle_boss１
16. battle_boss２
17. battle_boss 3
18. battle_boss 4
19. result_victory
20. result_lose
21. event_intermission_enemy
22. event_intermission_enemy
23. event_moved
24. event_disturbance
25. event_parting
26. event_castle town
27. system_strategy
28. system_menu
29. system_title
30. system_main thema

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Darkness Kingdom
